skillInfo.name: Charge
skillInfo.description: Gains 1 stack of Charge every 0.5 sec, and gains 10 stacks of Charge per every orb of mana used. Upon the 100th Charge stacked, enters Overcharge state. When in Overcharge, ATK is increased by ??? for 15 sec and each auto attack reduces skill cooldown by 10%. All effects cannot be dispelled, and Charge will not stack during Overcharge state.

dark: When Overcharge activates, increase all allies Atk Spd by 200, and increase the ATK of all allies by 5% of Annette's ATK.

profile.dislikes: People who look down on Technomagic

background.story: A genius technomagi from the Kingdom of Orvelia. She is highly optimistic, and failure never seems to bother her. She dreams of inventing a device that would allow anyone to handle magic one day. She has a magically engineered assistant whom she brought to life after years of research. Following the arrival of the Demons, she incorporated her research into developing weapons that would allow anyone to fight against the invaders.

itemIntroductions.weapon: The essence of technomagic, created based on Annette's theory. Five of the highest-ranking court wizards of Orvel have poured their energy into creating this magical being. It has its own will, making it capable of making independent decisions and acting on them. While it shares its mana with Annette, it can also utilize any other available mana nearby. As such, it is the first great milestone in Annette's effort to make magic available to all.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Rascal is an autonomous technomagic lifeform with free will, and is one of the wonders of Orverl.
However, Annette's success with the creation of a technomagic lifeform brought heated discussion among scholars.
Discussion soon turned into debates, and later into conflicts.

Some clained that Rascal's existence is a treacherous act against the God, and that it should be elminated at once, while others viewed Rascal as a miracle, a grand discovery, a salvation to the future of mankind.

Annette did not appreciate this conflict. She only wished to invent items that would help, protect, and make humans happy.
She had zero intention of unmaking Rascal. Rascal was her friend, her inventor partner, and a great assistant.
The source of Annette's happiness was watching Rascal improve.
There was no way Annette would think about being separated from it.
Meanwhile, Rascal strives to upgrade itself more and more to please Annette who always watched it with a grand expectation...
treasures: A triplex condensing lens invented by Annette to let Rascal use Blasting Ray. This special lens can be rotated to control its condensing rate and reflection angle, so that the shape of the photons fired can be easily manipulated. If all layers are aligned, Rascal shoots a linear photonic laser, and when the layers are cross-linked, it diffuses the reflection of photonic energy to perform Process of Elimination.

A healing script for emergencies. It's a product of the secret society of magic engineering, Babel's workshop for the month, 'Battles are Self-serve! Winning scripts in Mechanic Script Battles.' Created by Annette, it's a skill that can heal allies just through engineering, without borrowing any healing magic powers.

The top secret code of Babel, the secret society of magic engineering. Magic for normal people! The secret society of technomagi, Babel, is an anonymous society that dreams of making magic available to all. They have each provided a technomagical technique as a secret code, and they've only allowed the use of it to those who can decipher it. Annette deciphered a top secret code in 4 minutes and is using it in the annihilation process.

A battery that Annette developed with her technomagic knowledge using a strange material extracted from a fossil of an ancient civilization. It was initially made to supply backup power to Rascal in emergencies, but it was too powerful that it would overcharge Rascal a little too often. After thinking about it, Annette decided to use it in combat and customized Rascal's parts to utilize its powers.
